It's a "map battle" where you skip the battle
cut scene and performing the battle on the map.
The advantage is that the battle progresses
faster because there is no scene switching.
The side view battle image is also unnecessary.
The downside is that since it doesn't use battle
scenes, so plugins that only work in battle
Also, since there is no character animation, it
is somewhat inferior in terms of appearance.

Welcome to the world of "SRPG Gear MZ"!
I'm a maid serving as a guide!
I want to use it in RPG Maker MV
"SRPG Gear MZ" is a material for creating a
A successor material based on "SRPG converter
It corresponds to the ported version of "SRPG
Gear MV" to MZ, which is the material that can
be used to create SRPG with RPG Maker MV!
The concept is that anyone can easily create
You can create SRPG battles with map events,
and you can set up with memos in the database...
By using the original functions of Maker MZ,
we aim to create a material collection that is
easy to use even for beginners!
You can extend various functions by using other
people's plug-ins, so please try it!

In SRPG battles, when you are attacked by your
opponent, you can also take action in response!
Originally, when you can counterattack with a
weapon, it's an "attack". When you can't do it,
For example, if you equip the "strike bracelet",
you will be able to respond with "strike"

with the highest priority is selected.
